BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.VectorZ.vmap
BlackBox.template:
~SYM[0]_generate : for ~SYM[1] in (~RESULT'length - 1) downto 0 generate
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1])~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[1](~SYM[1])~
  ~INST
end generate;

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.VectorZ.vzipWith
BlackBox.template:
~SYM[0]_generate : for ~SYM[1] in (~RESULT'length - 1) downto 0 generate
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1])~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[1](~SYM[1])~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[2](~SYM[1])~
  ~INST
end generate;
